title: Rana Mashhood hails educators as Architects of Pakistan’s Future on world Teachers’ Day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 05 (APP):Chairman Prime Minister’s Youth Programme (PMYP), Rana Mashhood Ahmad Khan, has paid glowing tribute to teachers across the world, particularly those in Pakistan, on the occasion of World Teachers’ Day, recognizing their tireless efforts in shaping the nation’s future and strengthening the moral and intellectual foundations of society.
In his special message, Rana Mashhood said that teachers are the true architects of national progress, whose hard work, honesty, and dedication equip generations with the knowledge and skills needed to lead the country toward prosperity.
“Teachers are the guiding light of society, the ones who mold character, nurture intellect, and inspire progress,” he stated.
Highlighting the vision of the Prime Minister’s Youth Programme, he said the government is committed to empowering Pakistan’s youth through modern education, skill development, and access to global learning opportunities.
He emphasized that teachers play a backbone role in achieving these goals, adding that “enhancing the professional capacity of teachers and ensuring their social and economic well-being are essential for national growth.”
Rana Mashhood reaffirmed that respect for teachers is a cornerstone of Pakistani culture and a shared responsibility of all citizens. He noted that teachers’ guidance remains vital in character-building and leadership development among youth, while ensuring their rights and creating a supportive environment remain top government priorities.
He further stressed the need to promote national and international teacher-student exchange programs and collaborative educational initiatives to align Pakistan’s academic system with global standards.
“Our youth must be equipped to compete globally and bring honor to Pakistan through excellence in knowledge and innovation,” he remarked.
Concluding his message, Rana Mashhood Ahmad Khan expressed heartfelt gratitude to teachers for their unwavering dedication and service, expressing hope that their continued commitment will make Pakistan’s future brighter, stronger, and more prosperous.
